main.name: Semir Zulic
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: I’m a 30-year-old self-taught developer. I started learning 5 years ago. I thought I would go for a field that was stable and secure, so I chose web development. It is in the best interest of companies to hire personnel who are self-motivated and driven. I am that person. Currently employed and working in a team environment at acompany called Virgin Pulse. A team environment is efficient and productive, which I understand and appreciate. I have the ability to compromise, be respectful of others, and be a good listener as a team member. I can be a leader, when necessary, but can also be an equal player on the team if the job calls for it. I tend to do well in a team setting because I can relate to others well, have a professional demeanor, and understand what it takes to get the job done. I can help delegate tasks, compromise, and fulfill any role on the team that is needed. I am flexible in working independently or on a team, as needed by the task at hand.

education.school: JUMS ETS - Electrical Engineering Electronics - Tuzla

work.title: Software Developer Engineer in Test
work.description: Automating test cases as well as writing reusable scripts/tools that help the team to reduce repetitive efforts. Creating automation frameworks and enabling other SDETs to write tests using the framework.

work.title: Software Developer Engineer
work.description: Independently developing product features, investigating and resolving production issues, and performing in-depth troubleshooting.  Capable of implementing more complicated product stories, also involved in sprint planning and story grooming to give voice to the development complexity of new stories.

testimonials.text: Semir has been such an integral part of so many things that Engineering has done since he joined Olawell project. He’s played a pivotal role in the development of the Olawell project. And in everything, he approached his job in ways that were “Hungry, Humble, and Smart”!
testimonials.user: Džana Bašić-Čičak - PhD. Candidate (CSE) | Senior Bioinformatics Lead, Human Microbiome Products

testimonials.text: Working and Learning with Semir has been AWESOME, he makes working/learning  so easy and approachable!
testimonials.user: Maid Mesic - Software Developer at Cape Ann Enterprises

testimonials.text: Semir is absolutely excellent, I have thoroughly enjoyed having him on my team... I would definitely recommend
testimonials.user: Samir Kahvedzic - Software Developer at Cape Ann Enterprises
